We know there are 9,012,438 girls, so since there are twice as many boys as girls, we multiply the number of girls by 2. Therefore, Boys= Girls * 2. Substituting the value gets us Boys= 9,012,438* 2 => Boys = 18,024,876 . Hence, adding together males(boys) and females i.e., Total Students = Boys+Girls=>TotalStudents = 18,024,876+9,012,438 => TotalStudents =  27,037,314 . Given that there are 5 pupils for every educator , hence dividing total student figures calculated above into 5 units shall yield the precise quantity of instructors present ; To acquire such computation result : NumberOfTeachers=TotalStudentCount / StudentPerEducatorRate=>NumberOfTeachers=27,037,314 / 5 => Number Of Teachers equals
